NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
April 10, 1962
Miss Marion Corwell
Manager, Educational Television
Henry Ford Museum and Greenfield Village
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Marion:
Missed you at Muncie, but I can imagine that you're being kept busy
with your new series*
What is the status now of the PR kits and the Speaker's Guides? We
need to know so we can report to the NAEB Board May 1 in Columbus.
The last time I talked to Hank, he was having trouble with the artwork
for the cover of the kit, but you wrote since then to volunteer the
help of your staff artist; so perhaps that has been solved.
Then I believe you were handling the speaker's guides*..with Roy
Flynn helping by providing quotes that might be contained therein.
Perhaps we can show the Board what has been done to date, even if
the artwork isn't complete.
Would you bring me up to date, please? Thanks.
Best regards.
(Mrs.) Bt
Publications Editor
BMC/dp
cc: Harold E. Hill
Henry Mamet
Roy Flynn
Offices at 59 East Armory, Champaign, Illinois
